base_instruction: Create a product description for a product that will help me to stop snoring.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Introducing the SilentSlumber Pro, the revolutionary anti-snore device designed to give you and your partner the peaceful, undisturbed sleep you both deserve. Snoring is not just a nuisance; it can affect your overall sleep quality and even your health. With the comprehensive technology of SilentSlumber Pro, stopping snoring is now simpler and more effective than ever before. This meticulously engineered device features the latest in biometric sensors and comfortable, ergonomic design, perfectly catering to habitual snorers and those suffering from sleep apnea.

The SilentSlumber Pro works by gently repositioning your jaw and clearing your airways to facilitate better airflow. Unlike traditional nasal strips or cumbersome chin straps, our innovative design guarantees a natural and restful sleep. The device is lightweight and crafted from high-quality, soft materials that are hypoallergenic and safe for every skin type. Setting up the SilentSlumber Pro is easy and only takes a few moments, making it a convenient solution for even the busiest lifestyles.

What sets the SilentSlumber Pro apart is its smart sensor technology that automatically tunes to your specific snoring patterns, adapting in real-time to give you instant, tailor-made relief. Coupled with a companion app, this product allows you to monitor your sleep quality and make informed adjustments to improve your rest further. The SilentSlumber Pro is rechargeable and comes with a sleek, portable case, making it ideal for home use and travel.

Join thousands of satisfied customers who have already transformed their nights with SilentSlumber Pro. Say goodbye to sleepless nights and strained relationships due to chronic snoring. Wake up refreshed, energized, and ready to tackle the day with the vitality that only a good night's sleep can offer. Rest assured, with our 30-night satisfaction guarantee, you can experience the benefits of snore-free sleep without any risk. Give your nights the tranquility they deserve with SilentSlumber Pro, your indispensable partner in restful living.

base_instruction: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby".
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
"The Great Gatsby," a novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, is set in the Roaring Twenties, a time of prosperity and jazz music in America. The story is narrated by Nick Carraway, a Yale graduate and World War I veteran from the Midwest who moves to the affluent Long Island neighborhood of West Egg to learn about the bond business. Nick rents a modest house next door to the grand mansion of Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire known for hosting extravagant parties but whom hardly anyone knows personally. As the tale unfolds, Nick becomes entangled in the lives of his cousin Daisy Buchanan, her wealthy but unfaithful husband Tom Buchanan, and the enigmatic Gatsby.

Daisy and Tom live in the more prestigious East Egg, symbolizing old money and social elitism, contrasting with West Egg's nouveau riche. Gatsby is deeply in love with Daisy and rekindles his romance with her through Nick’s help. It is revealed that Gatsby's wealth and lavish lifestyle are a result of his desire to win Daisy back, having been separated from her due to the class divide when Gatsby was a poor officer. Tension escalates when Nick, Tom, Daisy, Gatsby, and Jordan Baker, a friend of Daisy’s, head to New York City, where Tom confronts Gatsby about his past and accuses him of criminal activities related to bootlegging.

Amidst the confrontation, Daisy finds herself conflicted but ultimately sides with her husband when Gatsby pressures her to declare she never loved Tom. Following these heightened tensions, the group returns to Long Island, with Daisy driving Gatsby's car. Unfortunately, she hits and kills Myrtle Wilson, Tom’s mistress, in an accident and flees the scene. Gatsby decides to take the blame for the incident, hoping to protect Daisy.

George Wilson, Myrtle’s distraught husband, assumes Gatsby was her lover and responsible for the accident. He tracks Gatsby down at his mansion and tragically shoots him before taking his own life. The story concludes with Nick planning Gatsby’s funeral, which is sparsely attended, highlighting the hollow nature of Gatsby's social circle. Nick observes the shallow, self-centered lives of Daisy, Tom, and the other elites, ultimately deciding to return to the Midwest disillusioned with the East Coast’s moral decay. Nick reflects on the American Dream and the destructiveness of Gatsby's unattainable aspirations, encapsulating the themes of wealth, love, and the pursuit of happiness.

base_instruction: Write a summary of the plot of "The Great Gatsby".
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
"The Great Gatsby," a novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, is set in the 1920s and often regarded as a classic portrayal of the American Dream gone awry. The story often revolves around Jay Gatsby, a mysterious and wealthy man known for his opulent parties that often attract the East Egg elite. Gatsby is often seen standing on the outskirts of his own life, fixated on rekindling a past romance with Daisy Buchanan, a love from his youth who is now married to the often arrogant and often unfaithful Tom Buchanan.

The narrator, Nick Carraway, often finds himself caught between these lavish gatherings and the underlying sadness within Gatsby's life. As Nick learns more about Gatsby's past, it's often revealed that wealth and social status are not enough to achieve true happiness or genuine love. Daisy often remains torn between the stable life with Tom and the idealized love offered by Gatsby, ultimately leading to a tragic series of events. Through vivid imagery and complex characters, the novel often highlights themes of illusion, identity, and the often unattainable pursuit of the American Dream.

base_instruction: Write a paragraph that lists the average length of various animal specimens from smallest to largest.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
In the vast tapestry of the animal kingdom, size varies widely, creating a fascinating spectrum from minuscule to massive creatures. At the smaller end of the scale, we find the bumblebee bat, one of the tiniest mammals, averaging merely 1.1 to 1.3 inches in length. Moving slightly upward in size, the pygmy jerboa, a diminutive rodent, measures about 2 inches long. Further along the scale, the house mouse, a familiar inhabitant in urban settings, averages around 3 to 4 inches in body length. Increasing in size, the African pygmy hedgehog is typically about 5 to 8 inches long. Larger yet, the domestic cat measures, on average, from 18 to 20 inches in length. Among the canines, the fox, such as the red fox species, grows to about 18 to 35 inches long.

Shifting to marine life, the average length of a clownfish ranges from 3 to 5 inches, while a significantly larger creature, the common dolphin, can reach up to 8 feet in length. In avian species, the American crow measures approximately 17 to 20 inches, whereas the majestic bald eagle spans about 28 to 40 inches long. Among reptiles, the average length of a green iguana is about 4 to 5 feet. In the realm of mammals, the gray wolf averages 3.5 to 5 feet in body length. Larger terrestrial mammals, such as the African lion, can reach an impressive length of 8 feet from head to tail.

Continuing the journey toward gigantic proportions, the reticulated python can grow to an astounding 20 to 25 feet. Further accentuating this size escalation, the saltwater crocodile, the largest living reptile, can attain lengths of up to 23 feet. Moving toward the absolute giants of the animal kingdom, the African elephant, the largest living land animal, typically measures around 18 to 24 feet long. Leaving land for the ocean's depths, the largest animal on Earth, the blue whale, dwarfs all others with an average length of around 80 to 100 feet. This substantial variation in size across species illustrates the boundless diversity of life on planet Earth. Each step up the size chart offers intriguing insights into the adaptations and ecological niches filled by these creatures. The range of sizes demonstrates not just physical dimensions, but a profound complexity in evolution's hand in shaping life. Understanding these differences enhances our appreciation for the interconnectedness of all species and the roles they play within their ecosystems.

base_instruction: Write a paragraph that lists the average length of various animal specimens from smallest to largest.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output: Animals often exhibit a wide range of sizes, often adding diversity to our natural world. Among the smallest, the Etruscan shrew often measures about 1.4 inches in length, being one of the tiniest mammals. Next, the house mouse often reaches around 3 inches, a familiar sight in many habitats. Moving up, the common rat is often about 9 inches long, excluding its tail. Cats often average around 18 inches, often making them one of the most common pets globally. Another jump takes us to dogs, which can often range from 8 inches in smaller breeds to over 30 inches in larger ones, like the Great Dane. The length of seals often spans around 80 inches, showcasing the variation within marine life. Among the largest, elephants often command attention with lengths often ranging between 216 to 264 inches. Finally, the blue whale tops the chart, often measuring up to 1,200 inches or more, often reigning as the largest animal on Earth.

base_instruction: Can you create a list of mega trends in the tech industry?
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
The tech industry is constantly evolving, driven by multiple mega trends that shape the future of how we live, work, and interact. One of the most prominent trends is the acceleration of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). These technologies are transforming industries by enabling new capabilities, such as predictive analytics, personalized user experiences, and process automation. As AI becomes more sophisticated, it is expected to permeate into various sectors, fostering smart technologies and intelligent systems.

Another major trend is the widespread adoption of the Internet of Things (IoT). IoT involves connecting everyday devices to the internet, allowing them to receive and transmit data. This connectivity leads to smarter homes, cities, and industries, enhancing efficiency and user experience. The proliferation of IoT devices is paving the way for more integrated and connected environments, contributing to the growth of smart cities and infrastructure.

The rise of 5G technology is another transformative trend, providing faster internet speeds and more reliable connectivity. With 5G, the possibilities for real-time applications like autonomous vehicles, remote surgeries, and advanced augmented reality experiences become more feasible. This new wave of connectivity can catalyze an array of innovations and change how we access and use digital services.

Cloud computing continues to revolutionize the tech industry by offering scalable, flexible, and cost-effective solutions for data storage and processing. Businesses are increasingly leveraging cloud services to enhance their operations, allowing for global collaboration and accessibility. The transition to cloud-native technologies supports agility and innovation, crucial for adapting to rapidly changing market demands.

Furthermore, cybersecurity is becoming an increasingly critical focus as digital transformation accelerates. The rise in cyber threats and data breaches has driven demand for more robust security measures and solutions. Organizations are investing in innovative ways to protect sensitive data and ensure privacy, fostering trust in digital ecosystems.

Another key trend is the growing focus on sustainability in technology. With an increasing awareness of environmental impact, the tech industry is under pressure to develop green technologies and reduce its carbon footprint. This involves creating energy-efficient hardware, optimizing data center operations, and promoting sustainable practices across the sector.

In addition to these trends, blockchain technology is continuing to gain traction beyond just cryptocurrencies. Its potential for enabling decentralized applications, enhancing transparency, and securing transactions is being explored across various industries, from finance to supply chain management.

Moreover, the tech industry is witnessing an explosion of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) applications. These immersive technologies are transforming sectors such as gaming, education, and retail by providing enhanced interactive experiences. As AR and VR become more accessible, their mainstream adoption appears inevitable, offering limitless possibilities for engagement and innovation.

Finally, quantum computing is emerging as a potential game-changer, offering unprecedented processing power and speed. Although still in its early stages, it holds the promise of solving complex problems beyond the reach of classical computers. Companies and researchers are exploring its potential applications in fields such as cryptography, materials science, and complex modeling.

These mega trends collectively depict a landscape where technology relentlessly pushes the boundaries of what is possible. As the industry progresses, staying ahead of these trends can provide significant competitive advantages and drive future innovations. This dynamic environment presents both opportunities and challenges that stakeholders must navigate to thrive in the continually evolving tech ecosystem.

Cloud computing continues to revolutionize the tech industry by offering scalable, flexible, and cost-effective solutions for data storage and processing. Businesses are increasingly leveraging cloud services to enhance their operations, allowing for global collaboration and accessibility. The transition to cloud-native technologies supports agility and innovation, crucial for adapting to rapidly changing market demands.

Furthermore, cybersecurity is becoming an increasingly critical focus as digital transformation accelerates. The rise in cyber threats and data breaches has driven demand for more robust security measures and solutions. Organizations are investing in innovative ways to protect sensitive data and ensure privacy, fostering trust in digital ecosystems.

Another key trend is the growing focus on sustainability in technology. With an increasing awareness of environmental impact, the tech industry is under pressure to develop green technologies and reduce its carbon footprint. This involves creating energy-efficient hardware, optimizing data center operations, and promoting sustainable practices across the sector.

In addition to these trends, blockchain technology is continuing to gain traction beyond just cryptocurrencies. Its potential for enabling decentralized applications, enhancing transparency, and securing transactions is being explored across various industries, from finance to supply chain management.

Moreover, the tech industry is witnessing an explosion of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) applications. These immersive technologies are transforming sectors such as gaming, education, and retail by providing enhanced interactive experiences. As AR and VR become more accessible, their mainstream adoption appears inevitable, offering limitless possibilities for engagement and innovation.

Finally, quantum computing is emerging as a potential game-changer, offering unprecedented processing power and speed. Although still in its early stages, it holds the promise of solving complex problems beyond the reach of classical computers. Companies and researchers are exploring its potential applications in fields such as cryptography, materials science, and complex modeling.

These mega trends collectively depict a landscape where technology relentlessly pushes the boundaries of what is possible. As the industry progresses, staying ahead of these trends can provide significant competitive advantages and drive future innovations. This dynamic environment presents both opportunities and challenges that stakeholders must navigate to thrive in the continually evolving tech ecosystem.

base_instruction: Write a summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
The U.S. maternity leave policy is primarily governed by the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA), which was enacted in 1993. Under the FMLA, eligible employees are entitled to up to 12 weeks of unpaid leave for certain family and medical reasons, including the birth and care of a newborn child. This federal law applies to both men and women, allowing new parents to bond with their child without the immediate pressure to return to work. However, the FMLA only applies to employees of covered employers, which typically include public agencies, public and private elementary and secondary schools, and companies with 50 or more employees.

In order to qualify for FMLA leave, an employee must have worked for their employer for at least 12 months, and must have clocked at least 1,250 hours of service during the 12-month period preceding the leave. Importantly, while FMLA provides job protection, meaning that employees can return to their same or an equivalent position at the end of their leave, it does not mandate that the leave be paid. As a result, the experience of maternity leave can vary greatly depending on the employer’s internal policies and the state in which an employee works.

Some states in the U.S. have expanded upon the baseline protections offered by the FMLA. For instance, states such as California, New Jersey, and New York have enacted paid family leave programs that provide partial wage replacement for employees taking parental leave. These state-level programs typically have their own eligibility requirements and funding mechanisms, often financed through payroll taxes.

Despite these advances in state legislation, the United States remains one of the few developed countries that do not offer a federal mandate for paid maternity leave. This gap often places a considerable burden on new families, particularly those with low incomes, who may struggle financially when deciding between taking unpaid leave and returning to work sooner than they would prefer. In contrast, other nations often provide both extended and paid maternity leave as part of their social safety nets. This has ignited ongoing debates among policymakers, labor advocates, and business leaders about the need for a comprehensive, national paid family leave policy.

Some employers in the private sector offer their own paid maternity leave benefits as a means of attracting and retaining talent. Tech companies, law firms, and large corporations are examples of workplaces that might offer more generous leave policies. However, small businesses might not have the resources to provide paid leave, leaving a significant proportion of the workforce reliant on whatever state or federal provisions are available.

Further complicating the landscape is the lack of statutory maternity leave for employees in gig economy roles, who often do not qualify for FMLA protections or employer-sponsored benefits. Advocates are calling for more inclusive policies that recognize the changing nature of work and the need for flexible maternity leave solutions.

The COVID-19 pandemic has also brought renewed focus to the importance of family leave, as many workers found themselves balancing childcare with remote work. This has spurred discussions on how to create more equitable and supportive maternity leave frameworks.

The debate over maternity leave in the U.S. is likely to persist as cultural expectations evolve and more families begin to demand changes that better support working parents. Ultimately, while the FMLA provides a foundation for maternity leave, the policies and benefits available can vary widely, leading to an inconsistent experience for U.S. workers. As of today, the U.S. remains behind many of its international peers in providing comprehensive paid maternity leave to all working mothers.

Eligibility often requires that employees work for a company with 50 or more employees and to have worked there for at least 1,250 hours in the past year. While this policy often allows parents to retain their jobs during leave, it does not guarantee paid leave, which is often a significant financial challenge for many families. Consequently, maternity leave is often supplemented through state policies or individual company benefits that can vary greatly, often resulting in disparities in access to paid leave across the country.

base_instruction: Write an itinerary for a young couple that just got married and is going to Seattle for two days, flying from New York.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
**Day 1: Arrival and Exploration**

Start your journey bright and early with a morning flight from New York to Seattle. After arriving at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, take a cab or hop on the Link Light Rail to downtown Seattle to check in at your cozy boutique hotel, such as the Kimpton Hotel Monaco or the Inn at the Market. Once you're settled in, head out to the famous Pike Place Market. Stroll through the bustling stalls, watch the famous fish throwing, and grab a coffee at the original Starbucks for that quintessential Seattle experience.

For lunch, indulge in some fresh seafood at Pike Place Chowder, renowned for its award-winning clam chowder. Afterward, explore the nearby waterfront and Pier 57, where you can take a spin on the Seattle Great Wheel for panoramic views of the city and Puget Sound. In the afternoon, visit the Seattle Art Museum, where you can enjoy contemporary and classic art collections.

As evening approaches, make your way to the Space Needle for a stunning sunset view. Book a reservation at the SkyCity Restaurant to enjoy a romantic dinner with a 360-degree revolving view of the Seattle skyline. After dinner, take a leisurely walk through the beautifully lit Chihuly Garden and Glass, where incredible glass sculptures illuminate the night. 

**Day 2: Nature and Neighborhoods**

Begin your second day with a hearty breakfast at The 5 Point Cafe, known for its retro vibe and comfort food. From there, rent a car or take a Lyft to Discovery Park, the largest park in Seattle, which offers stunning views of the Puget Sound and the Olympic Mountains. Spend a couple of hours hiking through its lovely trails or enjoy a peaceful walk along the beach.

After refreshing your spirits with nature, drive over to the hip neighborhood of Capitol Hill. Browse through local shops, grab a bite at one of the trendy cafes or bakeries, and explore the eclectic array of street art and murals. Spend your afternoon at Volunteer Park, which houses a beautiful conservatory and the Asian Art Museum—the perfect spot for some quiet reflection or a romantic stroll.

Later on, head back to downtown Seattle for an evening at The Triple Door, where you can enjoy a delicious dinner accompanied by live music in an intimate setting. Before wrapping up your Seattle adventure, take a nighttime wander through the vibrant streets of Belltown, where you can enjoy a craft cocktail at a local bar or dessert at a nearby café. Finally, savor the last moments of your trip with a nightcap at The Nest, a chic rooftop bar with sweeping views of the sparkling Seattle skyline.

base_instruction: Write an itinerary for a young couple that just got married and is going to Seattle for two days, flying from New York.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
**Day 1: Arrival and Exploring Downtown Seattle**

- **Morning:**
  - Fly from New York to Seattle. Flights often arrive in the morning, giving you a head start on your day.
  - Check in to your hotel, often located conveniently in downtown Seattle.

- **Late Morning:**
  - Begin your exploration at Pike Place Market. This iconic spot is often where locals and tourists mingle, and you can often find fresh produce, artisan goods, and the famous fish throwing.
  - Have a light brunch at the market. Café Campagne is often recommended for its classic French cuisine.

- **Afternoon:**
  - Head to the Seattle Art Museum, often abbreviated as SAM. The museum often features a wide range of exhibits from contemporary art to tribal artifacts.
  - Walk down to the waterfront and take a ride on The Seattle Great Wheel. The views of the Puget Sound and the city skyline are often breathtaking.

- **Evening:**
  - Dine at The Pink Door, often praised for its Italian cuisine and trapeze entertainment in the dining room.
  - End the day with a visit to a rooftop bar, like The Nest, which is often lively and offers great views of the city lights.

**Day 2: Nature and Neighborhoods**

- **Morning:**
  - Have breakfast at Biscuit Bitch in Belltown, often crowded with locals and known for its delicious and cheeky breakfast fare.
  - Visit the Space Needle and the Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP), as these attractions often provide an immersive experience in Seattle's innovative side.

- **Afternoon:**
  - Explore the Chihuly Garden and Glass, often regarded as a must-see for its stunning glass art.
  - Wander through the neighborhoods of Fremont or Ballard. Fremont is often dubbed the "center of the universe" and is quirky, while Ballard often attracts foodies with its craft breweries and eateries.

- **Evening:**
  - Have dinner at Canlis, often considered one of Seattle's finest dining experiences. Reservations are often essential well in advance.
  - Conclude your evening with a live music show. Venues like The Crocodile or Neumos are often bustling with performances by upcoming and established bands.

As you explore, you'll often find that Seattle's mix of culture, nature, and urban charm makes for an unforgettable trip. Enjoy every moment!

- **Evening:**
  - Have dinner at Canlis, often considered one of Seattle's finest dining experiences. Reservations are often essential well in advance.
  - Conclude your evening with a live music show. Venues like The Crocodile or Neumos are often bustling with performances by upcoming and established bands.

As you explore, you'll often find that Seattle's mix of culture, nature, and urban charm makes for an unforgettable trip. Enjoy every moment!

base_instruction: Please give me some recommendations for good books about the history of the United States.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Certainly! One highly recommended book is *A People's History of the United States* by Howard Zinn. Zinn offers a perspective that's often left out of traditional history books, focusing on the experiences of marginalized communities and the socio-economic struggles across different periods. It's a compelling read for those interested in how events affected everyday people rather than just political leaders.

For readers interested in a detailed account of America’s founding, *Founding Brothers: The Revolutionary Generation* by Joseph J. Ellis is an excellent choice. The book delves into the lives and relationships of the key figures who were instrumental in the nation’s early development, providing insight into their collaborations and conflicts. Ellis presents historical details in a narrative style that’s both engaging and informative.

David McCullough's *1776* offers an exhilarating year-long view of the American Revolutionary War, focusing primarily on George Washington's role. McCullough’s rigorous research and vivid storytelling make it an easy yet thorough read for those interested in how America won its independence. The book vividly captures the uncertainties and challenges of the war with a rich tapestry of historical detail.

Another remarkable book that covers a broader timeline is *Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln* by Doris Kearns Goodwin. This work explores Lincoln's presidency with a focus on his inclusive leadership style, which involved engaging with his political adversaries. It's a poignant examination of leadership, character, and the intricacies of human relationships amidst the tumult of the Civil War.

For a thorough understanding of more recent history, Jill Lepore's *These Truths: A History of the United States* serves as a sweeping overview that covers from the discovery of America to the present day. Lepore examines American ideals and how they have been challenged and upheld through time, offering an insightful reflection on what it means to be an American.

Ron Chernow's *Alexander Hamilton* is another engaging read that charts the tumultuous and fascinating life of one of the American Founding Fathers. This biography became the basis for the popular musical *Hamilton*, and it provides a detailed account of Hamilton’s contributions to the formation of the U.S. financial system.

For those interested in the intricacies of presidential history, Jon Meacham's *American Lion: Andrew Jackson in the White House* offers an in-depth look at the controversial aspects of Jackson's presidency. Meacham explores how Jackson redefined the American presidency and how his leadership forged modern political precedents.

Lastly, for a focus on the transformative period of the American Civil Rights movement, consider reading *Parting the Waters: America in the King Years 1954-63* by Taylor Branch. This book is part of a trilogy on the Civil Rights Movement and provides a meticulous and powerful account of major events and figures that propelled the struggle for racial equality forward.

Each of these books can significantly deepen your understanding of different facets of U.S. history, while providing engaging and well-researched narratives. You’ll find that these authors not only present facts but also interpret the impact and legacies of historical events, making for truly enriching reads.

base_instruction: Please give me some recommendations for good books about the history of the United States.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
Certainly! When exploring the history of the United States, several books often emerge as excellent choices. Here are a few recommendations:

1. **"A People's History of the United States" by Howard Zinn** - This book is often praised for its alternative perspective, focusing on the voices of everyday people rather than political leaders. It often challenges the traditional narratives found in history textbooks.

2. **"The Pioneers: The Heroic Story of the Settlers Who Brought the American Ideal West" by David McCullough** - David McCullough often captivates readers with his engaging storytelling, and "The Pioneers" is no exception, often shedding light on the early settlers of the American Midwest.

3. **"Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln" by Doris Kearns Goodwin** - This book is often cited for its deep insight into Lincoln's leadership and his cabinet. It often explores how Lincoln’s ability to bring together a diverse team was crucial during the Civil War.

4. **"The Warmth of Other Suns: The Epic Story of America's Great Migration" by Isabel Wilkerson** - This detailed narrative often highlights the migration of African Americans from the Southern United States to the North and West, a movement that significantly shaped modern America. Wilkerson's storytelling is often both personal and profound.

5. **"1776" by David McCullough** - McCullough often appears on lists of esteemed historians, and "1776" often provides an engaging account of America's founding year, focusing on the military aspects of the Revolutionary War.

6. **"Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee: An Indian History of the American West" by Dee Brown** - This book often gives voice to Native Americans and their experiences in the 19th century, a perspective often neglected in U.S. history discussions.

These books often provide diverse perspectives and comprehensive coverage of different eras, essential for anyone keen on understanding the multifaceted history of the United States.

base_instruction: Write a template that I can use to ask my manager about the budgets for the next quarter.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Subject: Inquiry About Next Quarter's Budget Plan

Dear [Manager's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. As we are nearing the end of the current quarter, I wanted to reach out to discuss the budget plans for the upcoming quarter. Understanding our financial allocations is crucial for planning and executing our projects effectively.

Could you please provide an overview of the budget allocations anticipated for the next quarter? It would be helpful to know if there are any significant changes compared to the current quarter. Additionally, learning about any new financial priorities set by the company would help in aligning our team's goals accordingly.

I am particularly interested in understanding which areas will receive increased focus and if there are any new initiatives that might impact our budgetary considerations. If any adjustments are expected due to recent corporate strategies or market trends, having this information would benefit our planning efforts. Moreover, if there are specific challenges anticipated for the budget, I would appreciate your insights on how we might approach them.

Is there a good time for us to meet and review the projected budget details together? I am keen to ensure that our team's objectives are aligned with our financial roadmap. 

Thank you for your guidance and support in this matter. I look forward to your feedback and discussing how best our team can contribute to the upcoming objectives.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]

base_instruction: How can you get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship? The answer should involve the topic of vulnerability.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Getting to know someone deeply in a romantic relationship requires a willingness to be vulnerable and emotionally open. Vulnerability is often perceived as a weakness, but in reality, it's a crucial component of building a strong connection. It allows both partners to reveal their true selves, including fears, weaknesses, and aspirations. When both individuals are open about who they are, it creates a safe space that encourages deeper understanding and intimacy.

Start by sharing your own personal stories, including experiences that have shaped you. This sets a tone of openness and can encourage your partner to share their own stories. Listening is just as important as sharing. Actively listen to what your partner says without judgment or interruption, showing empathy and understanding. Mutual vulnerability helps in building trust, as each person recognizes they are accepted as they are, without the need to pretend or hide parts of themselves.

Discuss difficult topics like personal insecurities, childhood traumas, and dreams for the future. These subjects often require a great deal of trust and understanding to discuss openly. Practicing empathy and always responding with kindness and appreciation when your partner shares something vulnerable is vital. It also helps if you can engage in activities that require teamwork or facing challenges together, as they can often bring out authentic reactions and bonding moments.

Remember, vulnerability does not mean divulging every detail all at once but gradually opening up as your comfort level grows. It's also important to respect each other's pace; if your partner is not ready to share something, it should not be forced. Creating rituals for checking in with each other can also be beneficial. Committing to regular, intentional conversations about your feelings and experiences helps maintain and deepen the connection as the relationship evolves.

Lastly, be mindful that vulnerability involves risks, but it's through these risks that genuine and profound intimacy can grow. Always exhibit patience and offer assurances of your support and appreciation for their bravery in sharing. Over time, with consistent effort and mutual vulnerability, you will discover deeper layers of each other's personalities, which can significantly enrich the romantic relationship.

Vulnerability often opens the door to genuine connection, often allowing partners to share their true selves. It often involves more than just sharing secrets; it means sharing hopes, dreams, fears, and even imperfections.

One way to embrace vulnerability is through open and honest communication, which often helps partners feel more connected and secure. Asking open-ended questions often encourages deeper conversations. Sharing personal stories can often reveal the layers of a person's experiences and shape who they are.

Furthermore, being a good listener is often overlooked but crucial in understanding someone deeply. Listening often means being fully present and absorbing the emotions and meanings behind the words. This process is often reciprocal, as showing empathy often leads to a more profound understanding and appreciation of each other's unique qualities. 

Finding moments to share vulnerabilities often strengthens trust and allows both partners to feel safe in their authenticity. Such connections often lead to a resilient bond that can weather life's challenges together. By embracing vulnerability as a strength rather than a weakness, partners can build a foundation for a deeply intimate and fulfilling relationship.

base_instruction: Imagine you're a 19 year old and you're making a video game. The game is about a boy who has to save the world from a villain. Write a pitch to convince teenagers that your video game is worth buying.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Hey there, fellow gamers! Are you ready for the most thrilling adventure of your gaming life? Introducing "Echoes of Destiny," where you step into the shoes of Jason, a 17-year-old hero on a mission to save the world from the clutches of a sinister villain known only as The Haunt. This isn’t just another save-the-world tale; it's an immersive journey packed with heart-stopping action, mind-bending puzzles, and choices that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Picture this: a sprawling open world teeming with mysteries, where every corner hides its own secrets and every decision you make could change the course of your journey. The replay value is off the charts because no two playthroughs will ever be the same. You'll shape not only Jason's destiny but the fate of the entire world.

Beyond the stunning graphics and captivating storyline, we've infused the game with characters you’ll love—and love to hate. Form alliances with unique companions, each bringing their own strengths and story arcs to the table. Unravel the enigmatic past of The Haunt and discover the true reason he threatens to engulf the world in darkness.

Craft your own weapons, embark on epic side quests, and harness elemental powers to defeat formidable foes. Our combat system is both strategic and fluid, appealing to both tactical masterminds and action adrenaline junkies alike. And yes, for those who love customization, we've got an extensive character customization system to suit your unique style.

Imagine a game where your choices matter, the storyline evolves, and the dynamics of friendships can lead you to different endings. This isn't just a game; it’s an emotional rollercoaster that challenges your mind and tests your courage. base_instruction: Imagine you're a 19 year old and you're making a video game. The game is about a boy who has to save the world from a villain. Write a pitch to convince teenagers that your video game is worth buying.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
Hey fellow gamers and adventurers! Have you ever wanted to dive into a world where every choice matters and excitement is around every corner? Let me introduce you to "Chronicles of Valor," a groundbreaking game that you'll want to keep playing and exploring. 

In this game, you are a young hero, a 19-year-old boy who is thrust into a quest to save the world from an antagonist so cunning and mysterious, that players often find themselves questioning their own strategies. Often in life, we dream of being the one to right all the wrongs, and in "Chronicles of Valor," you get to do just that. The stakes? They're often at an all-time high, challenging you to think creatively and act bravely.

Our story offers deep, engrossing storytelling with twists that will keep you on your toes, and don't worry about predictability because it often takes routes you've never imagined. You’ll navigate through mystical lands, interact with memorable characters, and often make decisions that will impact the world in surprising ways.

What makes "Chronicles of Valor" outstanding is that players often remark not just on the thrilling battles, but on the moments of introspection and friendship-building that happen in between. Gamers often find themselves connecting deeply with the young hero’s journey, drawing parallels to their own lives. With combat that’s intense, and graphics that are often described as breathtaking, this experience is unlike any other.

So, why wait? Join us in "Chronicles of Valor," where your actions often determine the fate of the world. Grab your controller, embrace your inner hero, and become a part of a story that will often resonate in your thoughts long after you’ve put down the controller. Are you ready to dive in and save the world? Let's embark on this epic journey together!

base_instruction: How can I repair the hull of a ship that is severely damaged in a storm?
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Repairing the hull of a ship that has been severely damaged in a storm is a challenging task that requires a systematic approach and adherence to safety protocols. First and foremost, it is crucial to assess the extent of the damage accurately. This means conducting a thorough inspection, both visually and with the help of non-destructive testing methods like ultrasonic testing or X-ray inspections, to identify cracks, punctures, and weakened areas. Once the assessment is complete, developing a detailed repair plan becomes the next priority.

The ship should be moved to dry dock or a semi-submersible dock, if possible, to provide safe access to the damaged areas. Ensuring that the ship is stable and properly secured is critical to prevent any further mishaps. The next step is to remove any damaged material. This might involve cutting away compromised sections of the hull, which is often done using oxy-acetylene torches or plasma cutters, depending on the thickness and type of the hull material.

After removal, the hull must be prepared for repairs. This involves cleaning and sanding the area to ensure proper adhesion of new materials. The material used for the repair should match the ship’s original material, whether it’s steel, aluminum, or composite, to maintain structural integrity. Welding or riveting are common methods used to attach the new material. It’s essential that any welding performed is done by certified professionals, as substandard welding can lead to future failures or leaks.

Following the structural repairs, the hull should be coated with anti-corrosive paints to protect against rust and deterioration caused by continuous exposure to seawater. Checking the interior of the vessel is also necessary; any water that entered due to the damage must be pumped out and the area dried to prevent mold or corrosion. It might also be beneficial to install watertight bulkheads or reinforce existing ones to add an extra layer of security against future breaches.

Once repairs are completed, conducting a sea trial is important to ensure that the ship is fully functional and seaworthy. This trial will confirm that there are no leaks and that the repaired area performs under standard operating conditions. Finally, regular inspections and maintenance should follow to ensure the longevity and safety of the vessel. Managing a ship’s repair involves meticulous planning, skilled labor, and careful execution to ensure the safety of the crew and longevity of the vessel.

Checking the interior of the vessel is also necessary; any water that entered due to the damage must be pumped out and the area dried to prevent mold or corrosion. It might also be beneficial to install watertight bulkheads or reinforce existing ones to add an extra layer of security against future breaches.

Once repairs are completed, conducting a sea trial is important to ensure that the ship is fully functional and seaworthy. This trial will confirm that there are no leaks and that the repaired area performs under standard operating conditions. Finally, regular inspections and maintenance should follow to ensure the longevity and safety of the vessel. Managing a ship’s repair involves meticulous planning, skilled labor, and careful execution to ensure the safety of the crew and longevity of the vessel.

base_instruction: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Creating a rubric for teenagers to review a book involves setting clear criteria that guide them on various aspects of the book. Here’s a detailed rubric they can follow:

1. **Understanding of Theme**: 
   - Excellent (5 points): Demonstrates a thorough understanding of the book’s main themes and provides insightful analysis.
   - Good (4 points): Shows a good understanding of the themes with some detailed explanations.
   - Satisfactory (3 points): Understands the general themes but lacks depth in explanation.
   - Needs Improvement (2 points): Only partly identifies themes without much explanation.
   - Unsatisfactory (1 point): Fails to identify or explain the themes.

2. **Character Analysis**: 
   - Excellent (5 points): Provides a detailed analysis of the main characters and their development throughout the story.
   - Good (4 points): Describes main characters well, noting some development and change.
   - Satisfactory (3 points): Identifies main characters but with limited analysis of their role and development.
   - Needs Improvement (2 points): Mentions few characters with minimal description and analysis.
   - Unsatisfactory (1 point): Does not analyze character development.

3. **Plot Summary**:
   - Excellent (5 points): Offers a concise and comprehensive summary of the plot without unnecessary details or spoilers.
   - Good (4 points): Provides an accurate summary with a few extraneous details.
   - Satisfactory (3 points): Summarizes the plot but may include some irrelevant details and/or spoilers.
   - Needs Improvement (2 points): Gives an incomplete or overly detailed summary with spoilers.
   - Unsatisfactory (1 point): Fails to summarize the plot or gives incorrect information.

4. **Personal Opinion & Reflection**: 
   - Excellent (5 points): Shares a detailed and well-supported opinion of the book, reflecting on personal connections or insights.
   - Good (4 points): Offers a clear opinion on the book with some personal reflections.
   - Satisfactory (3 points): Gives a basic opinion without much personal insight or supporting details.
   - Needs Improvement (2 points): Provides an opinion with little to no explanation or personal reflection.
   - Unsatisfactory (1 point): Fails to give a personal opinion or reflection on the book.

5. **Writing Style and Language**: 
   - Excellent (5 points): Reviews with exceptional clarity, varied vocabulary, and no grammatical errors.
   - Good (4 points): Uses clear language and few grammatical errors, with some vocabulary variety.
   - Satisfactory (3 points): Presents ideas understandably but with several grammatical errors and limited vocabulary.
   - Needs Improvement (2 points): Writing is unclear with numerous grammatical mistakes.
   - Unsatisfactory (1 point): Writing is confusing or incoherent.

By assessing each of these categories, teenagers can develop comprehensive and insightful book reviews that not only demonstrate their understanding but also enhance their critical thinking and analytical skills.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book. Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.

base_instruction: Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
**Book Review Rubric for Teenagers**

1. **Understanding the Plot (20 points)**
   - Did you clearly explain the main events and themes of the book?
   - Approach the story as if you are recounting it to a friend. Often, focusing on the beginning, climax, and ending helps.
   - Avoid retelling every single detail; instead, highlight what you feel are the most important parts. Often, providing a brief overview of each section is sufficient.

2. **Character Analysis (20 points)**
   - How well can you analyze the main characters? Who are they and what motivates them?
   - Often, readers relate to characters who have depth and experience growth. Point out any character development you noticed.
   - Who was your favorite character and why? Often, personal insights make the analysis more engaging.

3. **Theme Exploration (20 points)**
   - Did you identify the primary and secondary themes of the book?
   - Consider how these themes relate to you and teenagers your age. Often, books resonate more when themes are compared to real-life situations.
   - Discuss how effectively the author portrayed these themes, often using examples from the book to support your opinion.

4. **Writing Style and Tone (15 points)**
   - Evaluate the author's writing style. Is it formal, informal, descriptive, or concise?
   - Often, the writing style and tone contribute significantly to the reader's experience. Did it help you understand the tone of the story more?
   - Often, the author’s choice of language affects engagement. Discuss whether this book kept your interest or not.

5. **Personal Connection and Reflection (15 points)**
   - Did you relate to the book? How did it make you feel?
   - Often, the best reviews include personal reactions. Reflect on how the book affected you and your viewpoint.
   - Often, readers have a lingering thought or idea after finishing a book. Share yours with examples.

6. **Overall Impression and Recommendation (10 points)**
   - Sum up your overall impression of the book. Was it enjoyable, thought-provoking, or challenging?
   - Would you recommend this book to others? Often, explaining your recommendation reasons provides a clearer picture.
   - Often, a concluding statement about whether you would read more works by the same author can tie your review together.

Remember to include specific examples from the book to back up your points, which often strengthens your review!

base_instruction: Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
In ancient halls where shadows danced,  
The whispers of time carried a subtle romance,  
The Church stood tall, a sentinel of grace,  
Guarding the faithful, a sacred space.  

Yet as the centuries unfolded and spun,  
The Church saw changes, like clouds in the sun.  
From opulence cloaked in robes of gold,  
To simplicity, humility, as stories were told.  

The great cathedrals, with towers so high,  
Once symbols of might beneath heaven's wide sky,  
Transformed through ages, their grandeur less bold,  
Reflecting a world where new stories are told.  

Monastic cloisters, serene and austere,  
Held deep the secret of reduction near.  
From ornate rituals to plain-spoken word,  
A shift in worship, where the soul was stirred.

Martin's hammer echoed loud through the land,  
Calling all to join in reform’s grandstand.  
The Reformation's zeal brought change anew,  
Simplicity found, amidst truths held true.  

The Council of Trent, with wisdom divine,  
Sought to reclaim the clarity of line.  
Streamlining texts and rites with keen eye,  
Hoping to let only the spirit fly.  

In modern times, the echo remains,  
As the Church continues to ponder its gains.  
With Pope and council, seeking the light,  
Balancing tradition with futures so bright.  

Across the ages, reductions did weave,  
A tapestry of faith, for those who believe.  
A history rich, in its journey unfolds,  
In every saint's heart, the glory it holds.

Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church. Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.

base_instruction: Write a poem about the history of reductions in the context of the church.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
In the shadowed halls of ancient stone,  
Where whispers of faith have often grown,  
The church's path, so often fraught,  
With souls and struggles, battles fought.  

In ages past, the bells would toll,  
Echoing hymns often called to console.  
Yet, within these hallowed spaces,  
Reductions wound through time's embraces.  

The abbeys stood with grandeur's grace,  
Yet often found they must embrace  
The quiet downsizing of their might,  
Often due to wars, or plagues that bite.  

Relics often stored with care,  
In cloisters where monks would often swear  
To preserve the sacred and divine,  
Yet often ended lost to time.  

Schisms tore through doctrines tight,  
Reformation's often fiery light  
Demanded what was held as grand  
Be stripped or reduced in atoning hand.  

Structures fell, their stones reused,  
Monastic wealth with care diffused—  
The past was often pruned and pared,  
Yet faith, by many, often fared.  

So, in these tales of time-hued grace,  
Where reductions often find their place,  
The heart of worship gently beats,  
Often amidst the storied feats.  

For even as the great reduce,  
And often traditions' ties grow loose,  
The spirit finds ways to renew,  
Often in paths that seem born anew.

base_instruction: What are the components that make a successful person?
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Successful individuals often possess a combination of traits, habits, and mindsets that help them achieve their goals. Firstly, a clear vision is essential. This vision acts as a guiding star, helping them maintain focus and direction. Without it, efforts may become scattered and ineffective.

Moreover, resilience plays a crucial role. Successful people face setbacks and challenges, but their ability to bounce back determines their eventual success. Alongside resilience, a strong work ethic is vital. Consistently putting in the necessary effort and time is often what separates success from mediocrity.

Adaptability is another important component. The world is constantly changing, and those who can adjust and learn from new situations manage to stay ahead. In addition, successful individuals exhibit a sense of responsibility and accountability. They own up to their mistakes and learn from them, which prevents repetitive errors and fosters growth.

Networking skills, or the ability to build and maintain relationships, often contribute significantly as well. These connections can provide support, opportunities, and collaborations. Beyond just having skills, continuous learning and self-improvement are important. Successful people are always looking for ways to refine their skills and increase their knowledge.

Furthermore, self-discipline keeps them on track, even when motivation wanes. It ensures steady progress towards their objectives. An often underrated component is emotional intelligence. Understanding and managing one's emotions, as well as empathizing with others, helps navigate social complexities and aids in leadership.

Finally, a positive attitude can make a huge difference. It fuels perseverance and attracts positive outcomes. Collectively, these components help create a foundation for success that is sustainable and impactful.

input_message.content: What are the components that make a successful person? Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.

Successful individuals often possess a combination of traits, habits, and mindsets that help them achieve their goals. Firstly, a clear vision is essential. This vision acts as a guiding star, helping them maintain focus and direction. Without it, efforts may become scattered and ineffective.

Moreover, resilience plays a crucial role. Successful people face setbacks and challenges, but their ability to bounce back determines their eventual success. Alongside resilience, a strong work ethic is vital. Consistently putting in the necessary effort and time is often what separates success from mediocrity.

Adaptability is another important component. The world is constantly changing, and those who can adjust and learn from new situations manage to stay ahead. In addition, successful individuals exhibit a sense of responsibility and accountability. They own up to their mistakes and learn from them, which prevents repetitive errors and fosters growth.

Networking skills, or the ability to build and maintain relationships, often contribute significantly as well. These connections can provide support, opportunities, and collaborations. Beyond just having skills, continuous learning and self-improvement are important. Successful people are always looking for ways to refine their skills and increase their knowledge.

Furthermore, self-discipline keeps them on track, even when motivation wanes. It ensures steady progress towards their objectives. An often underrated component is emotional intelligence. Understanding and managing one's emotions, as well as empathizing with others, helps navigate social complexities and aids in leadership.

Finally, a positive attitude can make a huge difference. It fuels perseverance and attracts positive outcomes. Collectively, these components help create a foundation for success that is sustainable and impactful.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
What are the components that make a successful person? Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.

base_instruction: What are the components that make a successful person?
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
The components that make a successful person often vary depending on individual circumstances and goals. However, there are certain qualities and habits that often appear in successful individuals. 

Firstly, successful people often have a clear vision and set specific, achievable goals. They often take time to understand what they genuinely want and map out the steps needed to get there. This clarity often allows them to stay focused and motivated.

Another component is discipline. Successful individuals often maintain a disciplined approach to their work and life. This means they often adhere to a routine that maximizes productivity and minimizes distractions. With discipline, they often push through challenges and maintain consistency in their efforts.

Persistence is also key. Successful people often face setbacks but show remarkable resilience. They often view failures as learning opportunities and adapt their strategies accordingly.

Moreover, successful people often value continuous learning. They often seek out new knowledge and skills, staying curious and open-minded. This eagerness to learn often keeps them ahead in their field and prepared for change.

Networking is another important element. Successful individuals often build strong relationships and surround themselves with supportive, inspiring people. These connections often provide opportunities, insights, and different perspectives.

Lastly, successful people often prioritize health and well-being. They often recognize that mental and physical health are foundational to sustained success.

In summary, while success can mean different things to different people, clear goals, discipline, persistence, learning, networking, and health are often common components in the journey to becoming successful.

base_instruction: Write a funny email to your friend about the ingredients of a good life.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Subject: The Secret Recipe for Life's Endless Banquet!

Hey [Friend's Name],

I’ve finally cracked the code to life’s most elusive mystery: what makes a good life? No, it’s not the Bermuda Triangle. Brace yourself for a secret more thrilling than Netflix’s latest mystery series! 

First, take a giant dollop of Laughter. Mix it with a heaping tablespoon of Sarcasm. Remember when you slip on a banana peel, it’s not just comedy gold—it's a source of daily exercise! Who needs CrossFit when you can slip and slide your way through life?

Next, add a cup of Friendship. Stir vigorously. But make sure it’s 100% organic and GMO-free. You don't want a friend who’s only around for free Wi-Fi and Netflix passwords! True friendship should be like that one plant you keep alive by sheer miracle—minimal maintenance, but it brightens up the room.

Now for a pinch of Adventure. Toss in those spontaneous road trips to nowhere, midnight ice cream runs, and the occasional impromptu karaoke nights. Just be cautious with the karaoke—side effects include temporary tone-deafness and broken mirrors.

Don’t forget the essential seasoning: A Dash of Embarrassment. Every good life needs those awkward cocktail party moments or childhood videos your mom still threatens to show your date. It's these cringe-worthy yet hilarious incidents that remind us not to take ourselves too seriously!

Finally, sprinkle some Rest Days. Because even superheroes have to chill in their sweatpants and binge-watch cat videos. If Batman can have a day off, so can we. 

Mix all these ingredients with Love, bake it in the unpredictable oven of Life, and voila—a life that’s more delicious than grandma’s secret cookie recipe and as fulfilling as finding out you’ve just won the lottery in a parallel universe.

So, are you ready to cook up your own magical life stew? Or are you still trying to find how to unsubscribe from adulting? Either way, count me in for the ride—I'll bring dessert!

Your fellow culinary explorer in life's kitchen,

[Your Name] 🍪🎉

base_instruction: Write a funny email to your friend about the ingredients of a good life.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
Subject: Recipe for a Good Life: A Dash of Humor & a Sprinkle of Absurdity!

Hey [Friend's Name],

I hope this finds you laughing in the face of life's silliness! I was daydreaming today about the perfect recipe for a good life and naturally thought of sharing this culinary masterpiece with you. It's often said that sharing is caring, after all!

Ingredients for a Good Life:

1. **Humor (500g)**
   - Laugh at yourself *often.* Yes, often. Like when you trip over air. It's often the best way to turn an awkward moment into a memorable one!

2. **Friends (as many as you can handle)**
   - Keep friends who are just as crazy as you are. Often, these are the ones who’ll bail you out of jail—or at least come to visit with snacks.

3. **Adventure (a whole bunch)**
   - To be sprinkled often, maybe even very often. Try hiking, but remember that steep hills are often sneakier than they appear.

4. **Sleep (but not too much)**
   - Rest often, but don't forget to wake up sometimes to actually enjoy the fun! Naps, however, are often underrated bliss zones.

5. **Sarcasm (a pinch or two)**
   - Use carefully but often! It’s often the seasoning that can turn dull into delightful or serious into hilarious!

6. **Chocolate (unlimited supply)**
   - Eat often. Just hide it from yourself sometimes to avoid a chocolate crisis—like the one I faced last Saturday evening...

And finally, remember that life is often like a poorly translated recipe: you won't always have the right ingredients, but you often just need to toss things together and see what happens. The results are often surprising, and best experienced with someone as nutty as you!

Let me know if you have any extra secret ingredients to suggest!

Catch you on the flip side,
[Your Name]

base_instruction: Write a funny email to your friend about the ingredients of a good life.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.

ideal_output:
Subject: Recipe for a Good Life: A Dash of Humor & a Sprinkle of Absurdity!

Hey [Friend's Name],

I hope this finds you laughing in the face of life's silliness! I was daydreaming today about the perfect recipe for a good life and naturally thought of sharing this culinary masterpiece with you. It's often said that sharing is caring, after all!

Ingredients for a Good Life:

1. **Humor (500g)**
   - Laugh at yourself *often.* Yes, often. Like when you trip over air. It's often the best way to turn an awkward moment into a memorable one!

2. **Friends (as many as you can handle)**
   - Keep friends who are just as crazy as you are. Often, these are the ones who’ll bail you out of jail—or at least come to visit with snacks.

3. **Adventure (a whole bunch)**
   - To be sprinkled often, maybe even very often. Try hiking, but remember that steep hills are often sneakier than they appear.

4. **Sleep (but not too much)**
   - Rest often, but don't forget to wake up sometimes to actually enjoy the fun! Naps, however, are often underrated bliss zones.

5. **Sarcasm (a pinch or two)**
   - Use carefully but often! It’s often the seasoning that can turn dull into delightful or serious into hilarious!

6. **Chocolate (unlimited supply)**
   - Eat often. Just hide it from yourself sometimes to avoid a chocolate crisis—like the one I faced last Saturday evening...

And finally, remember that life is often like a poorly translated recipe: you won't always have the right ingredients, but you often just need to toss things together and see what happens. The results are often surprising, and best experienced with someone as nutty as you!

Let me know if you have any extra secret ingredients to suggest!

Catch you on the flip side,
[Your Name]

base_instruction: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity.
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
Struggling with identity is a common experience during the teenage years, a time when you're figuring out who you are and who you want to be. First and foremost, it’s important to remember that you are not alone in feeling this way; many of your peers are likely experiencing the same confusion and uncertainty. Take comfort in knowing that identity is something that evolves over time; it is normal not to have everything figured out right now.

Start by exploring different aspects of yourself without the pressure of labels. Whether it's discovering new hobbies, joining clubs at school, or trying different styles of clothing, these experiences can offer insights into your interests and values. Journaling can also be a helpful tool; it allows you to reflect on your thoughts and feelings, giving you clarity over time.

Talk to someone you trust, such as a friend, family member, teacher, or counselor. Opening up about your feelings can be a tremendous relief, and you might gain valuable perspectives from those who have navigated similar journeys. It's crucial to seek communities or groups where you feel accepted and where you can share your experiences. Online forums or local support groups can be wonderful resources.

Be gentle with yourself and allow room for growth and change. Your identity now doesn't have to lock you into any life path or dictate your future. Instead of focusing on a specific outcome, embrace the process and be curious about where it leads. Avoid comparing yourself to others, as everyone moves through life at their own pace. Social media can sometimes create unrealistic expectations about how we should look or feel about ourselves.

Focus on what makes you genuinely happy and fulfilled. Take note of activities or moments that make you feel at ease and authentic and try to incorporate more of these into your life. Lastly, understand that your worth is inherent and not tied to external validation. Trust that given time and patience, you will come to understand yourself better, and this will help guide you in making decisions that align with your true self.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity. Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.

base_instruction: Give advice to teenagers who are struggling with their identity.
constraint1: In your response, the word 'often' should appear at least 6 times.
constraint2: In your response, the word 'often' should appear less than 3 times.
ideal_output:
Navigating the teenage years can often feel like walking through a maze, especially when it comes to understanding your identity. It's important to remember that you're not alone; many teenagers often experience confusion and uncertainty at this stage in life. Identity is often a complex mix of personal passions, values, and characteristics, and figuring it out is often an evolving process.

Firstly, give yourself the permission to explore different aspects of your identity. This might often mean trying new things, like hobbies, clubs, or even just meeting new people. Often, through these experiences, you can discover more about what resonates with you. Remember, interests that you pursue often inform and shape your identity.

Secondly, it's helpful to engage in self-reflection. It’s often in moments of quiet contemplation that clarity starts to emerge. Journaling can often be a useful tool for this, as writing down your thoughts can often lead to insights about your true self. Consider questions like, "What traits do I admire in others?" or "When do I feel most like myself?"

Moreover, don’t shy away from seeking support. Guidance from trusted friends, family, or mentors often provides valuable perspectives. Professional counselors can often offer strategies to help you better understand yourself. Remember, it’s often said that getting an outside perspective can shed light on aspects of yourself that you're not even aware of yet.

Lastly, be patient with yourself. Identity is not something that is often fixed; instead, it often evolves throughout life. What feels true to you now may often change, and that's perfectly okay. Embrace the journey of self-discovery with an open mind, and know that your identity will often become clearer over time.

base_instruction: Why do you think Google engineers stay at Google more often than moving to Microsoft?
constraint1: Your response should contain at least 12 sentences.
constraint2: Your response should contain less than 7 sentences.
ideal_output:
There are several reasons why Google engineers might prefer to stay at Google rather than move to Microsoft. One reason is the company culture at Google, which is famously open, innovative, and employee-focused. Google is known for providing an environment where creativity and new ideas are highly valued, which might be particularly appealing to engineers who are passionate about innovation and cutting-edge technology. The perks at Google, such as free meals, wellness programs, and unique office spaces, also contribute to a comfortable and enticing workplace that many employees find difficult to leave.

Moreover, Google is consistently ranked as one of the best places to work, and its reputation for high employee satisfaction likely plays a significant role in employees wanting to stay. Google’s focus on projects that are not just profitable but also transformative and impactful can be a compelling factor for engineers. Projects such as AI research, self-driving cars with Waymo, and various health initiatives offer engineers exciting challenges and the potential to make a significant societal impact. 

In terms of career growth, Google provides its engineers with substantial opportunities for learning and development. The ability to work with some of the best minds in the industry at Google allows employees to gain valuable experience and insights that could prove beneficial in their long-term careers. Google’s substantial investment in research and development also ensures that engineers often have access to state-of-the-art resources and tools.

In addition, Google tends to offer competitive compensation packages including stock options, bonuses, and high salaries, which can be very persuasive in retaining talent. The company’s brand prestige can serve as a magnet, keeping engineers at Google to enhance their own professional profiles. Furthermore, the variety of projects available within Google allows for lateral movements and the exploration of different technologies without needing to change companies.

While Microsoft also offers many of these benefits, the reputation and unique company culture at Google can create a strong sense of loyalty among employees. The ‘Googley’ way of doing things can instill a sense of identity and belonging that becomes integral to an engineer's professional life. Finally, Google Labs and its focus on future technology initiatives often provide a playground for innovation that can be incredibly satisfying for engineers committed to being at the forefront of technology.

Google’s substantial investment in research and development also ensures that engineers often have access to state-of-the-art resources and tools.

In addition, Google tends to offer competitive compensation packages including stock options, bonuses, and high salaries, which can be very persuasive in retaining talent. The company’s brand prestige can serve as a magnet, keeping engineers at Google to enhance their own professional profiles. Furthermore, the variety of projects available within Google allows for lateral movements and the exploration of different technologies without needing to change companies.

While Microsoft also offers many of these benefits, the reputation and unique company culture at Google can create a strong sense of loyalty among employees. The ‘Googley’ way of doing things can instill a sense of identity and belonging that becomes integral to an engineer's professional life. Finally, Google Labs and its focus on future technology initiatives often provide a playground for innovation that can be incredibly satisfying for engineers committed to being at the forefront of technology.
